title: Unable to find my account
body:
So today I tried to log in to my account but got the alert that my account was transferred to a different region.  I can't open a ticket because not knowing what region it was sent to means that I don't have enough information to open a ticket (for some reason).  So I can't access my account and I can't open a ticket.  How do I get my account back?

Also I feel like Riot should have a customer service number for things like this

Edit: The email address and passwords were also changed so I can't get anything back

replies.body: Don't worry, we can help with this!  Even though you may not be able to login to submit a ticket, you can email us directly via support@riotgames.com.  Send us an email, and after a brief verification we can assist with account recovery.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
I was finally able to submit a ticket.  Should I still send an email?  I submitted the ticket 20 hours ago but haven't gotten a response.
